page.title: 15SURVEY OF BEARSTED POND
page.content: Classes 2/S and 2/C at Roseacre School surveyed the{BEARSTED}village pond. The pond has an area of approximately 385 sq.metres. JULY 4th 1985. The plants found were: {HORNWORT BOG BEAN {CANADIAN POND WEED ARROW HEAD {YELLOW IRIS FLOWERING RUSH {REED MACE WATER PLANTAIN {WHITE WATERLILY MARSH MARIGOLD {SILVER WEED SEDGE} The animals found were: {FRESHWATER SHRIMP DWARF POND SNAIL {WATER MEASURER GREAT CRESTED NEWT {MINNOW GOLD FISH {EMPEROR DRAGONFLY LEECH {THREE SPINED STICKLEBACK FROG(COMMON) {WANDERING POND SNAIL WATER SPIDER {WATER STICK INSECT POND SKATER {WATER BOATMAN DAPHNIA {DAMSELFLY LARVA SMOOTH NEWT {CADDISFLY LARVA GREAT DIVING BEETLE
